Dialogue.Page: I donâ€™t know what I expected, but... wow... not this beautiful forest!
Gosh, it's so existant! Look how good it is at existing! Wow. Truly the best exister ever.
I have no words... for the forest, I mean. I have words for the path markers that totally exist over there! One of them is "south"!
I get to hike through a forest of lantern trees! This was so worth it!
